alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:37PM EDT until July 17 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Schuyler County in central New York... Southeastern Yates County in central New York... Northeastern Steuben County in central New York... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 836 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Urbana, or 11 miles southwest of Dundee, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Starkey, Urbana, Watkins Glen, Dundee, Montour Falls, Tyrone, Pulteney, Wayne, Bradford and Hammondsport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
